Description: Nile silt pottery vase with flat base, rounded side, everted rim, coated with a thick red slip and burnished with vertical strokes
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911), p. 16, pl. xxxii.36e This pot is Polished red ware P36e in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric pottery. .
